original_title: Central Bank to announce plans for Domestic Debt Optimization
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – According to the Ministry of Finance, the Central Bank is set to unveil its upcoming initiatives on domestic debt optimization on Tuesday (04).
Minister of State for Finance, Shehan Semasinghe, highlighted that the decisions regarding future activities will be based on the outcomes of this program.
